message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its features and value, I'm offering it at $13,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $9,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?
